default.text: it's... silent in here, I like it :)
I can't believe this happened, this sucks!
nothing can stop me from getting beer, we have to break out!
I believe there is no way how we can break free from confinement now.
... But look what I got here: My T-900 original Dice pair! We won't get bored at least.

cellBars.text: <joseph tries to bend the cell bars but whatever what he does, it doesn't result in any visual changes>
It doesn't work??? how is this possible?

rollDice.text: You little nerd, this ain't some kind of game, IT'S THE JAIL!!
Beware the true power of this armed and fully operational dice!

higherPower.text: I call upon thee to set us free!
WHO DARES TO DISTURB ME! <snickering outside>
IF I SHOULD GRANT YOU YOUR WISH, FIRST GRANT ME MINE!
No, let them promise their first born.
The dishes! Let them do the dishes!
Oh come on, we heard you alright... just leave us alone!
As you command... <starts looking for a shrubbery>

bendingBars.text: Step aside! All those years of training finally pay off!
<The bars remaing unaffected by Jakobs brute force>
Oh my big strong (yet ineffective) hero!
Faith can move mountains! We have to believe in Jakob being able to subdue those puny bars of steel.
Oh cute little squirrel! Come here!
Go to hell you dumb B#$%H!
Are you alright zoe? You were stroking the pillow for 5 minutes now.
You're the Obelix of stoned people...

tracyEatingSandwich.text: I'm looking after my homies, here you go.
YUCK! This is completely inedable. Why did you carry THAT around?!
I liked the green color, if you don't like it give it back!
No way you're going to eat that. <throws the sandwich out of the window.
Stop with the sad eyes, I'll buy you a new one. You know, like - once we get out of here.
Are you done babbling? I need a beer, we need to get out of here. What do we do now?

choices.text: I just have to bend those cell bars and we're as good as free.
I am hungry, Zoe give me the sandwich you found.
We can roll dice, when we roll a pair we get free
Unbelievable, we rolled a pair and the door is now unlocked, let's get outta here!
We rolled a pair, and are still here, but we could try again!
Maybe dice rolling is of no use after all... but maybe one last time?
Ew, no pair... but logic tells us, we should roll again!
